title: How To Record Calls on iPhone or Android (5 Ways)
tags: The Best Ways To Record Phone Calls on Android and iOS

description: Okay, So here are all the possible ways to record to your phone calls on android and iOS.  Video Content  1. Record Phone Calls using Google Voice  2. Record Phone Calls using Inline Recording Device 3. Record Phone Calls using 3-way calling services like Recordator. 4. Using apps - call recorder ACR for iPhone use - TapeaCall 5. Record VoIP call like Whatsapp and skype.  Useful links  Google Voice   Forus FSV-U2 Cell Phone Call Recorder      Recordator    Similar service is    Automatic Call Recorder   TapeACall Lite - Call Recorder For Phone Calls   Right now, I'm listening to this podcast. And it's pretty cool.    If I miss something let me know in the comment below.   You can reach me here  Website -  YouTube -  Facebook - Twitter -  Instagram -   Which background music did I use? Luvly from Joakim Karud    What camera do I use?  Canon 70D  What mike do I use? Blue Yeti and Video Mic pro (depends on requirement)  What tripod do I use? Manfrotto MVKBFR  What video editor do I use? Final Cut Pro  My computer do I use? iMac 2015 for editing and a ThinkPad for casual work
